title: soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds, Noise Blocking Earbuds for Sleep, Comfortable Fit, Bluetooth 5.2, App, for Unlimited Sleep Sounds, Sleep Monitor, Personal Alarm, Side Sleeper
descriptions:
soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds

Drift off faster and stay asleep longer with ultra-comfortable sleep earbuds designed specifically for side sleepers. Sleep A10 combines a slim, lightweight build with smart noise masking and app-driven sleep features to create a restful, personalized bedtime routine—without active noise cancelling and without disturbing anyone around you.

Key features:
- Slim, side-sleeper friendly design: Low-profile, lightweight earbuds sit snugly with no protrusion for all-night comfort. Recommended for indoor use to ensure peak performance.
- 4-Point Noise Masking System (no ANC): Ear wings and Twin Seal ear tips create a secure seal, while smart volume control automatically raises or lowers sleep sounds to mask ambient noise.
- Customized sleep sounds: Specially tuned dynamic drivers focus on low frequencies, delivering soothing tones that sit 10 dB lower than standard drivers for a calmer soundscape.
- soundcore app integration: Access unlimited white noise and relaxing soundscapes, build routines, and tailor audio to your sleep environment.
- Sleep monitoring and insights: Track sleep status, duration, and quality right in the app to understand and improve your rest over time.
- Auto-pause when you doze off: Playback automatically pauses once you fall asleep to help conserve battery and maintain quiet.
- Personal alarm: Wake up gently without disturbing your partner—alerts play privately through the earbuds.
- Reliable connectivity: Bluetooth 5.2 for stable, low-latency streaming from your favorite sleep apps and playlists.

What’s in the box:
- Sleep A10 earbuds with ear wings
- Twin Seal ear tips (multiple sizes)
- Charging case
- USB-C charging cable
- Quick start guide and safety information

Ideal for:
- Side sleepers seeking an all-night, pressure-free fit
- Light sleepers who need consistent noise masking without ANC
- Partners sharing a bed who want a private alarm
- Anyone looking to track and improve their sleep routine

Notes:
- Designed for indoor use. For best results, ensure a proper seal with the Twin Seal ear tips and ear wings.
- Active Noise Cancelling is not included; noise reduction is achieved through physical sealing and smart masking audio.
